channel.description: Gordon Beeming - Father • Husband • Triathlete • SSW Solution Architect

item.title: Visual Studio Team Services Overview - Video Series
item.description: A couple weeks ago I was asked to present at DUT to a group of students. The presentation was quite a long one so I had to cut some bits out in order to present in the timeslot that I had. So I decided that I'd record all the content and post it up so that others can potentially benefit from it as well.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Bulk import git repositories into VSTS/TFS
item.description: With the rate that the VSTS team releases with all the features they releasing it's hard to know everything that exists in VSTS. I recently needed to migrate git repos from various Team Project Collections (TPC) into a single Team Project and started out doing it very manually and slowly progresses to importing over 100 in a couple hours .
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
